LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="6098334a7dcf40109b5486c4918474bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]You have got to be kidding![etc:Wait frame="8"/] HIM again![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I can't believe he's here![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6098334a7dcf40109b5486c4918474bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]Will he ever stop getting in my way?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6098334a7dcf40109b5486c4918474bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]"Him" who?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] HIM![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Your pilot, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6098334a7dcf40109b5486c4918474bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf08"/]Santi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Right now I'm a freelance pilot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but he and I have a long history, you see...
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="5e2660bcafe54a72a191ee6b47a61f9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the day I was born,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] HE was
there in the same hospital in the bed
right next to mine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sound asleep.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5e2660bcafe54a72a191ee6b47a61f9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I haven't been able to get away from him
since then.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] No matter where I go,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he
somehow always shows up there.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="2161d1af06fa4391b3e5996b197a2e00" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Even now I remember our field day in
elementary school.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was leading in the
obstacle course until the last challenge![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2161d1af06fa4391b3e5996b197a2e00" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]It was the final obstacle.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The tug-of-war![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2161d1af06fa4391b3e5996b197a2e00" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I'll admit that HIS technique was superb.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2161d1af06fa4391b3e5996b197a2e00" Scale="1"/]But come on![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Give at least an inch...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]just
one inch of rope.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="52400da4d05748e7ab1b739269a405c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]As soon as I could go to college,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I left my
home planet.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I thought I would finally be
free from living in his shadow.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52400da4d05748e7ab1b739269a405c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly"/]I arrived at the dorm ready for a fresh
start.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then I heard it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] His booming voice
coming from inside my assigned room![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52400da4d05748e7ab1b739269a405c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]"It may not look like much,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but MY ROOM
will be the FUN ROOM on campus!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52400da4d05748e7ab1b739269a405c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]He had already transformed it into
HIS space...
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="e2b6b3e1434b480ba2cae767bf3c24a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Right after graduation,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I went to work for
a space station boxed-lunch vendor.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e2b6b3e1434b480ba2cae767bf3c24a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]They went bankrupt trying to compete
with a rival's groundbreaking "One-a-Day
Meal Drink" that HE helped develop.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e2b6b3e1434b480ba2cae767bf3c24a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]I saw HIM in an interview saying,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "It's such
a PAIN digging through boxed lunches!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e2b6b3e1434b480ba2cae767bf3c24a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Did he SERIOUSLY come up with a new
product using that as motivation?
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="9e1a000b08814f9b9033903a84577927" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]After that first company I joined went
bankrupt,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hopped from planet to planet
exploring various job opportunities.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9e1a000b08814f9b9033903a84577927" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I was a lottery forecaster and fortune-
teller,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then a caf√© manager...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Even tried
my hand at screenwriting for a bit.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9e1a000b08814f9b9033903a84577927" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I don't have any regrets about starting
so many different jobs.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I learned a lot
from each experience!
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="80d6e89bb56146d2a52e82eedaf378b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I made up my mind to get a pilot's license
for flying large spaceships,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then set off
for a planet with a training camp.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="80d6e89bb56146d2a52e82eedaf378b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]It was a school for pilots where some
of the big draws were private lessons
and courses in acrobatic flying.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="80d6e89bb56146d2a52e82eedaf378b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]When I got there,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] guess who was in the
instructor seat.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yep,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it was HIM.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="80d6e89bb56146d2a52e82eedaf378b0" Scale="1"/]It took three LONG months to get my
license.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was stuck with him day and
night for that whole time.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="9eef233acace4779a67367eb599c2d91" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I was a pilot for a space-flight company
at my last job.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] One day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the company
president came to inspect the site.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9eef233acace4779a67367eb599c2d91" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The ship landed after showing off some
superb acrobatic flying.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Guess who
came out of it then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] shouting...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9eef233acace4779a67367eb599c2d91" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]"Oh, it's my best bud![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's been AGES!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9eef233acace4779a67367eb599c2d91" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Every day HE was there doing inspections.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I have to admit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I got more than my fill of
hands-on experience with acrobatic flying.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="bd18b9db3e314b39b6e977dbe78c6782" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf06"/]Chewy[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s taken care of me since I joined
the company.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm worried the stress of the
crash and everything might overwhelm her.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="5a69fbddd3f7458bb51a8d96b5374d4e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I was confident in my ability to handle
spaceships,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I never would've guessed
I'd run into something like this.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5a69fbddd3f7458bb51a8d96b5374d4e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I have trouble believing that HE crashed
here too.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] His skills are advanced so far
beyond my own.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="39bfdf53406b488dacd8bda6fdc1df9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]The whole time I was leafified,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I could hear
a voice calling out...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] HIS voice...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="39bfdf53406b488dacd8bda6fdc1df9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]"Hoo![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let's do DANDORI challenges!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="39bfdf53406b488dacd8bda6fdc1df9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]HIS voice took me back to the spaceship
training camp.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was like a nightmare that
just wouldn't end.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="6cfcc49a284949acbb24bb288da2fd30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If I make it home safe,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think I'll try
to become a permanent employee at
Satella Travel.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cfcc49a284949acbb24bb288da2fd30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I'd like to use my varied work experiences
to make [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf06"/]Chewy[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s life a bit easier if I can.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="d6e9a48ac822418fb18c26ea1e18f452" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the day I was born,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] HE was
there in the same hospital in the bed
right next to mine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sound asleep.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d6e9a48ac822418fb18c26ea1e18f452" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I haven't been able to get away from him
since then.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] No matter where I go,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he
somehow always shows up there.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="57d22fb4b8f24efbab8e7df40adde1bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Even now I remember our field day in
elementary school.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was leading in the
obstacle course until the last challenge![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="57d22fb4b8f24efbab8e7df40adde1bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]It was the final obstacle.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The tug-of-war![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="57d22fb4b8f24efbab8e7df40adde1bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I'll admit that HIS technique was superb.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="57d22fb4b8f24efbab8e7df40adde1bd" Scale="1"/]But come on![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Give at least an inch...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]just
one inch of rope.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_04:

Meal Drink" that HE helped develop.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bcaf84c6d49e46ee9e4810516c7d37ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]I saw HIM in an interview saying,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "It's such
a PAIN digging through boxed lunches!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bcaf84c6d49e46ee9e4810516c7d37ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Did he SERIOUSLY come up with a new

LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="6094182c522a44ecb1cb021400efef7b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]After that first company I joined went
bankrupt,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hopped from planet to planet
exploring various job opportunities.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6094182c522a44ecb1cb021400efef7b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I was a lottery forecaster and fortune-
teller,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then a caf√© manager...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Even tried
my hand at screenwriting for a bit.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6094182c522a44ecb1cb021400efef7b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I don't have any regrets about starting
so many different jobs.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I learned a lot
from each experience!
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="07a815d65d8542e78b528f98361d9458" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I made up my mind to get a pilot's license
for flying large spaceships,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then set off
for a planet with a training camp.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="07a815d65d8542e78b528f98361d9458" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]It was a school for pilots where some
of the big draws were private lessons
and courses in acrobatic flying.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="07a815d65d8542e78b528f98361d9458" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]When I got there,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] guess who was in the

license.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was stuck with him day and
night for that whole time.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="429bd914ada44780a49c3a2128baa24c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I was a pilot for a space-flight company
at my last job.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] One day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the company
president came to inspect the site.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="429bd914ada44780a49c3a2128baa24c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The ship landed after showing off some
superb acrobatic flying.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Guess who
came out of it then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] shouting...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="429bd914ada44780a49c3a2128baa24c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]"Oh, it's my best bud![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's been AGES!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="429bd914ada44780a49c3a2128baa24c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Every day HE was there doing inspections.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I have to admit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I got more than my fill of
hands-on experience with acrobatic flying.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="a8c3b2944148403e95b4dc50394c434c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf06"/]Chewy[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s taken care of me since I joined
the company.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm worried the stress of the
crash and everything might overwhelm her.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="bf161434ce6944219bae1d72ee984eb8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I was confident in my ability to handle
spaceships,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I never would've guessed
I'd run into something like this.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bf161434ce6944219bae1d72ee984eb8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I have trouble believing that HE crashed
here too.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] His skills are advanced so far
beyond my own.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="2ebf66b08a5e4a42b8dde88e4de38abc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]The whole time I was leafified,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I could hear
a voice calling out...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] HIS voice...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2ebf66b08a5e4a42b8dde88e4de38abc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]"Hoo![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let's do DANDORI challenges!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2ebf66b08a5e4a42b8dde88e4de38abc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]HIS voice took me back to the spaceship
training camp.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was like a nightmare that
just wouldn't end.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="490e0235007c461db484d3dbf3288105" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I feel more at ease with you around.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It
helps me forget about HIM,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if only just
for a short time.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="9cc1e262e2fd412e96638d2078d13baa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Seeing you reminds me of that part-time
gig I had where I put on a dog costume to
hand out flyers.
LF007.LF007_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf08"/][UE:Meta key="b98b6eaf9cc6457b962a25d6daee7380" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]It'd be safer to change up your look if you
don't want HIM following you around.
